name: LANBENA Upgraded 2.0 Bamboo Charcoal Blackhead Remover Mask, 60 pcs Nose Strips, Peel off Face Mask Pore Whiteheads Cleanser Strawberry Nose Purifying, Deep Cleansing for All Skin Types, 30g/1.05oz
short_description: 【Stronger Removal and Purification】 LANBENA Upgrade 2.0 Bamboo Charcoal Blackhead Removal Nose Mask has added bamboo charcoal to the original formula and has a thicker liquid, giving it a stronger pore cleansing and purifying power to remove stubborn blackheads; Getting a cleaner nose and face.

【Cold weather use without heating】 LANBENA's original formula utilizes new technology that solves the phenomenon of condensation on cold days, this 2.0 product will no longer condense, making it easy to use directly.

【Say Goodbye to Clogged Pores】 It can also effectively dissolve excess oil on the face, purify pores and slow down sebum secretion; it can pull up blackheads, whiteheads, impurities and dirt from the root of the pores.

【Mild, Calming】 The Blackhead Remover Mask also contains witch hazel, aloe vera and other natural botanicals that refine pores and leave skin moisturized, nourished and clear. Soothing and restorative, gentle and non-irritating.

【Low Odor, No Irritation】Maximizes the pungent odor found in previous products; in addition, this blackhead removal product keeps the strong adsorption ability while reducing the risk of irritation and allergy.

short_description: INSTANTLY UNCLOG YOUR PORES - Biore Pore Strips instantly clean and unclog pores to purify your skin for the deepest clean in just 10 minutes.
REDUCE BLACKHEADS - See instant results when you use Biore Pore Strips. With continual use, you can help reduce the appearance of blackheads and see a visible reduction in the size of your pores.
FOR MOST SKIN TYPES - Biore Pore Strips remove dirt from skin, leaving you with clean, fresh skin care.
BINDS TO BLACKHEADS, NOT SKIN - Using our patented c-bond technology, Biore Pore Strips are designed to be used once a week to bind to and remove blackheads not skin.
LIKE A BLACKHEAD MAGNET - Our uniquely developed pore strips act like a magnet to safely and effectively remove dirt, reduce oily skin, and help eliminate blackheads.
Unclogs pores & achieves the deepest clean
product_description: Remove blackheads and shrink the size of pores with Bioré Blackhead Reducing Deep Cleansing Pore Strip. These deep cleansing nose strips target blackheads and unclog pores for healthy looking skin. Convenient and easy to use, these Pore Strips can be used 1x per week for the deepest clean. Unlike other wannabe ‘pore strips’, ONLY Bioré Deep Cleansing Pore Strips use patented C-bond technology to bind to blackheads and impurities, NOT to skin. These strips are super magnetic to safely and effectively remove dirt, oil, and even stubborn blackheads. Bioré Deep Cleansing Pore Strips leave skin feeling cleaner with visibly smaller pores after continuous use. A dermatologist-tested way to remove blackheads and purify pores. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

short_description: 🌟 More Coverage for Bigger Breakouts: Take on major breakouts with Mighty Patch Face, the first hydrocolloid mask with five gunk-absorbing XL pimple patches to reduce the look of acne overnight — so your whole face looks clearer in the AM.

🚩 Covers 5 Key Acne Zones: Specially contoured to fit forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks. Handle a whole breakout area with a single patch overnight, or combine all five for a full-face mask moment.

⏱️ Reduces the Look of Pimples In 6-8 Hours: Our mega-powerful hydrocolloid effortlessly absorbs the gunk from whiteheads and protects skin as your pimples are healing. No picking or popping required.

🙌 Serious Sticking Power: Ultra-thin, extra-large, and super flexible to hit hard-to-reach spots (like between brows) and stay comfortably in place. Smile, eat, sleep — no worries, these patches won’t budge until you peel them off.

✅ Drug-free & Derm-tested: Made of 100% medical-grade hydrocolloid gel. Clinically tested, allergy tested, and UV sterilized. Each box comes with 5 hydrocolloid patches for oily/combo acne-prone skin types.

name: Bioré Paint & Peel Liquid Pimple Patch, Invisible Pimple Patch with Salicylic Acid, Up to 100 Uses, .5 Oz
short_description: INVISIBLE PIMPLE PATCH - Bioré Paint & Peel Liquid Pimple Patch offers a discreet way to clear your skin and works for all stages of pimples, including newly emerging pimples; Best for daytime use
SALICYLIC ACID - Made with 1% Salicylic Acid, this acne spot treatment forms a barrier to keep treatment at the source​
CUSTOMIZABLE PIMPLE PATCH - Standing apart from other pimple patches, this liquid pimple patch goes is invisible and can be applied on tough-to-cover crevices and curves​
FAST ACTING RESULTS - Paint on this salicylic acid pimple patch, then peel and reveal clearer, calmer skin in just 4+ hours
SKIN APPROVED SKINCARE - This liquid pimple patch works on all skin types and is dermatologist tested, non-comedogenic, non-drying/irritating​
product_description: Stop pimples in their tracks with the new way to patch! Biore Paint & Peel Liquid Pimple Patch helps you tackle breakouts invisibly. Just paint-on and peel-off this invisible pimple patch on any size outbreak, anywhere pimples form–especially hard to reach areas like the crevice of your nose. The flexible, gel-like liquid forms a custom patch that keeps treatment at the source. Formulated with 1% salicylic acid, this liquid acne spot treatment reduces redness and pimple discomfort in only hours. Bioré Paint & Peel Liquid Pimple Patch works on all stages of pimples before they pop, even early-stage blemishes as they start to emerge. To use our liquid pimple patch, simply apply the liquid using the applicator tip that’s included. The liquid pimple patch will dry and become invisible in about 10 minutes. Then, after 4-8 hours, peel it off to reveal clearer skin.​ And it’s good for up to 100 uses! Bioré Paint & Peel Liquid Pimple Patch is for all skin types, suitable for sensitive skin, and invisible on all skin tones. It is dermatologist tested, non-comedogenic, non-drying, and non-irritating, so you can feel good about adding it to your skincare routine. Say goodbye to visible pimple patches–and welcome into your world a new way to patch!
